Description:
We are seeking an experienced and highly motivated Irrigation Supervisor to oversee and maintain the landscaping and irrigation systems of an ultra-luxury hotel in Saudi Arabia. You will be responsible for managing all aspects of the irrigation system, including design, installation, operation, and maintenance. As the Irrigation Supervisor, you will work closely with the landscaping team to ensure that all grounds and gardens are properly irrigated and maintained.Design, install, and maintain irrigation systems for the hotel's extensive grounds and gardens.
Develop and implement irrigation schedules, based on the specific needs of different plant species and soil types.
Manage and supervise a team of irrigation technicians and landscapers.
Troubleshoot and repair irrigation system malfunctions.
Order and maintain an inventory of irrigation system parts and supplies.
Comply with local regulations and safety standards.
Keep detailed records of irrigation system maintenance, repairs, and upgrades.Job Details
